remarks: A projection is self-adjoint.  Property (i) of [Beran] p. 109. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjidm.1 $e |- H e. CH $.
pjidm.2 $e |- A e. ~H $.
pjadj.3 $e |- B e. ~H $.
pjadjii $p |- ( ( ( projh ` H ) ` A ) .ih B ) = ( A .ih ( ( projh ` H ) ` B ) ) $.
